jobs.name: MERN Stack Developer
jobs.shortJobDescription: We are looking for MERN Stack Developer. Experience of 4-5 years with analytical and problem-solving aptitude.
jobs.shortCompanyDescription: Superior Electric Machines Private Limited, a successful company spanning more than three decades in providing solutions to air movement in India & abroad by developing, manufacturing and supplying external rotor motors, axial fans, centrifugal fans, blowers, in line duct fans etc.
jobs.fullJobDescription:
We are looking for MERN Stack Developer.
Experience of 4-5 years with analytical and problem-solving aptitude.
Design and development experience building a reusable REST API model/framework to publish and consume data across systems.
Integration of user-facing elements developed by Web/Mobile front-end developers with server side logic
Strong proficiency with MERN (Mongo, Express, React and Node) Stack.
In depth knowledge of NodeJS, ExpressJS and related JS frameworks such as React, Ember etc.
Integration of data storage solutions primarily MongoDB.
Experience of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, CSS3 and others.
Strong hands-on experience with AWS cloud technologies
User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments.
Integration of multiple data sources and systems via APIs, good understanding of end to end API management patterns.
Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests.
Proficient understanding of DevOps (CI/CD) and version control with Github.
Practicing agile or scaled agile methodologies for software delivery (preferably Azure DevOps).
Creating secure mobile applications on various platforms.
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry Type: IT Services & Consulting
Department: Engineering - Software & QA
Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent
Role Category: Software Development
Education
UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate
Doctorate: Doctorate Not Required

build environment

jobs.shortJobDescription:

jobs.shortCompanyDescription: Privacera empowers data-driven cultures where trusted data is democratized, shared, and leveraged for insights and decision making. Our journey below is a testament to this mission.
jobs.fullJobDescription:
Role Title: Python Full stack

Location: Pune/Remote

Hiring Manager: Sushil /Sandeep

Do you thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic startup environment? Do you like being part of a rapidly growing organization and growing with it? Privacera is a leading provider of software products that Fortune 1000 organizations use to discover, organize, catalog, protect, and govern their cloud and on-premise data assets. At Privacera, you will collaborate with talented colleagues who are passionate about delivering value for enterprise customers. Privacera has the bulk of their operations in India.

We are looking for: A passionate Software Development Engineer to design, develop and install connectors that help in managing enterprise data security needs. These connectors will help bring in more enterprise integrations with our core product that will help to address the challenges faced in the areas of data governance, data security and compliance.

We are looking for ..

Looking for an Automation engineer who is passionate about building cutting edge products.
Good knowledge of Python, Splunk and or any APM tools.
Good knowledge of Pytest framework for Automation.
Ability to learn new technologies, adapt and provide solutions.
Looking for a highly competitive person who likes, owns, and delivers on time bound challenges.
Knowledge of Cloud Infra (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Build tools that can integrate with the existing pipelines of build and deployment to help with changes in deployment from On-Prem to Cloud and vice versa.
Knowledge of security domain is a plus
Knowledge of Jenkins is a plus

Your experience should include:

B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering or MCA or equivalent
Work experience of more than 5 years of relevant software development experience
Sound experience in Python Development.
Expertise in full life cycle of Python Application Developments, including Analysis, Requirement Gathering, Maintenance and Enhancements
Good to have experience in cloud native applications/services on AWS/GCP/Azure
Experience troubleshooting and supporting features on a scaled web application
Excellent communication skills and interact effectively with internal and external resources.
Company Overview:

At Privacera, we are solving deep security and governance challenges across hybrid cloud environments. Enterprises are moving data to the cloud at a rapid pace and enabling multiple cloud services to enable the use of their data. Enabling the right users to have access to the right data is a significant challenge in this cloud-based architecture. Privaceras solution enables a single pane of glass for enterprise visibility of data and enables centralized controls over data in the cloud. Privacera is growing rapidly via the intersection of the two hottest trends in the enterprise industry; enterprise data moving into the public cloud, and the need for security, governance, privacy which are becoming table stakes in every industry.

Company Culture:

Joining the Privacera team means you are joining the team recognized by Forbes as one of America’s Best Startup Employers! You will be embarking on a journey with a passionate group of people building important technologies for the enterprise industry. Let your ideas, experience, and expertise help shape the future of data governance and security. Our corporate culture is built on the core values of openness, product excellence, and customer-centricity. We encourage team members to practice open communication, move fast and break old molds in our journey to build the best products in the world. We are a transparent, customer focused team that collaboratively gets things done.

Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion:

At Privacera, we are committed to building a diverse and inclusive culture where our teams can thrive. It is our priority to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards. Candidates looking for employment at Privacera are considered without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.

jobs.name: Node js Developer
jobs.shortJobDescription: We are looking for a Node.js Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition, and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.

Work as part of a team developing applications and services using Agile development methods

Build customer-facing UI and back-end services for payment processing administration and management 
Responsible for Code, teste and operate node.js based services 
Understand the requirements and come up with Design and implementation strategies. Effectively use tools and ingenuity to identify and fix defects before they become a problem  
Need to have very good hands-on experience on Node Middleware  
Interact with client stakeholders on a daily basis
Skills Required:

Node JS, Java Script, Typescript, ES6  
Unit Testing - Mocha, Chai, Karma, Jest  
Should have good design and analytical skills 
Exposure to GIT, Jenkins, NPM, Yarn  
Knowledge of AWS(Kubernetes) and Docker will be a plus  
Microservices Architecture knowledge will be a plus
